document_data.mainbody:
ook Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Cook Street was located in the south section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. Cook Street originated on Lackpurse Lane at the border between the Castle Ward and Dock Ward, branching north before terminating at a dead end just shy of Soldiers Street. Other roads connecting with Cook Street included Soothsayers Way and Rainrun Street.
* Azuths Mug tavern
